#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define gc getchar

using namespace std;

long int t,n;

void scanint(long int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    long int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}

int main()
{
    scanint(t);

    while(t--)
    {
        scanint(n);

        if((n&1)==0)
            printf("YES\n");
        else
        {
            if(n%3==0)
                printf("YES\n");
            else
                printf("NO\n");
        }
    }

    return 0;
}
